definition[0]: if something soaks up a liquid, it takes the liquid into itself
example[0]: He used a towel to soak up the blood.
definition[1]: to sit outside for a long time enjoying the sun
definition[2]: to enjoy a place by watching it or becoming involved in it
example[1]: Go to a sidewalk café, order coffee, and soak up the atmosphere.
definition[3]: to learn something quickly and easily
example[2]: Children soak up language incredibly quickly.
